Kookaburras are quite rare. They possess unusually long legs and brilliantly-colored feathers... They peck the enemy with their beaks and use a mysterious and extremely powerful magic. They don't respond well to beatings. The only reason I was able to capture them is their susceptibility to magic. <[npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_6.htm|"I want to choose another NPC."] [npc_%objectId%_formAlliance 35620|"I want to form an alliance."]
